fields.name: Orbium Martinez
fields.recipe: 40ml Hendrick's Orbium Gin, 20ml Dolin Sweet Vermouth, 5ml Maraschino Liqueur
fields.method: Combine all ingredients over ice in a mixing glass.  Stir and then strain into a cocktail glass.

fields.name: Midsummer Solstice Bramble Spritz
fields.recipe: 35 ml Hendrick's Midsummer Solstice, 15 ml Creme de Mure / berry liqueur, 10 ml Fresh lemon juice, 60 ml Soda water, top with Sparkling wine
fields.method: Add all the ingredients to a large wine glass full with cubed ice. Stir gently to mix. Garnish and serve.

fields.name: Moonlight Buck
fields.recipe: 50 ml Hendrickâ€™s Luna Gin, 150 ml Premium Ginger Ale, 3 Cucumber Slices, Twist of Lemon Peel
fields.method: Combine all ingredients in a highball filled with ice. Lightly stir.
fields.garnish: 3 thinly sliced rounds of cucumber and a twist of lemon.

fields.name: Gin and Tonic
fields.recipe: 50 ml Hendrick's Gin, 150 ml Tonic Water, 3 rounds of Cucumber
fields.method: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass filled with cubed ice. Lightly stir.
fields.garnish: Garnish with 3 thinly sliced rounds of cucumber.

fields.name: Negroni
fields.recipe: 35 ml Tanqueray Dry Gin, 25 ml Italian Aperitif bitters, 25 ml sweet Vermouth, orange twists
fields.method: Combine all ingredients over ice in a lowball glass. Lightly stir.

fields.name: No10 Martini
fields.recipe: 50 ml Tanqueray No10 Gin, 10 ml dry Vermouth, Pink grapefruit twists
fields.method: Stir Tanqueray No10 gin and vermouth together, and strain into chilled martini glass.
fields.garnish: Garnish with a Pink grapefruit twist.

fields.name: Slojito
fields.recipe: 50 ml Gordon's Sloe Gin, 1 tbs Brown Sugar, 10 Basil leaves, 1 splash of soda water
fields.method: Add Sloe Gin, sugar, basil and ice to cocktail shaker. Shake until cool. Pour into tall glass and top up with soda water.
